column4: im updating now because the way things are lopoking the servers will be swamped with requests for breezy tomorrow
ok folks ive just installed breezy
but when I rebooted i see grub with hoary and breezy
te kernel for oary and breezy I mean
and when I select breezy, kubuntu's screen pops up while grub is loading
what didn't you understand (not trying to be a prick just trying to understand if im not being clear enough)
what do you mean grub is loading while the ubuntu screen pops up?
but that's what you said, no?
I don't think it's grub that's loading in this case but the linux kernel
anyway, what's the exact problem you're having?
i'm a bit confused i'm afraid... you see breezy and hoary in the grub menu, and that's a problem because?
so can you actually boot into breezy?
but you can't boot into your old hoary installation?
so you're just wondering why the hoary boot entries still show up?
probably because you still have the old kernel image from hoary installed
if you remove the hoary image? no, it's safe to remove if the breezy image works
